dmca.title: ON TRACK has detected unauthorized images on www.photoradarspray.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: ON TRACK Manufacturing Corp. [mailto:info@ontrackcorp.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 11, 2006 12:35 AM
To: info@photoradarspray.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: aquaciti@mts.net
Subject: ON TRACK has detected unauthorized images on
www.photoradarspray.com
Importance: High


Attn: Mr. Bruce Buchel 
Aqua-Citi Inc. 
P.O. Box 35058 
963 Henderson Highway 
Winnipeg, Manitoba, R2K 4J9 

cc. Mr. George Poletes, Corporate Counsel 
Servermatrix.com aka ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110 
Dallas, TX 75207 


UNAUTHORIZED COPYRIGHT NUMBER ONE 
ON TRACK Fraud Watch has detected blatent and unauthorized use of
copyrighted ON TRACK materials on your website at: 
http://www.photoradarspray.com/ 


You are using 2 images of the yellow corvette which are owned by ON TRACK &
can be clearly viewed at: 
http://www.ontrackcorp.com/photofog_testresults.htm 


ON TRACK owns both the negatives and originals of these photos and the
license plate on the car clearly reads "ONTRACK". 


UNAUTHORIZED COPYRIGHT NUMBER TWO 
ON TRACK Fraud Watch has detected unauthorized use of copyrighted ON TRACK
materials on your website at: 
http://www.photoradarspray.com/faq.htm & 


You are using 1 image of the red jeep which is owned by ON TRACK & can be
clearly viewed at: 
http://www.ontrackcorp.com/overhead_protector.htm 
http://www.ontrackcorp.com/super_protector.htm 


UNAUTHORIZED COPYRIGHT NUMBER THREE 
ON TRACK Fraud Watch has detected unauthorized use of copyrighted ON TRACK
materials on your website at: 
http://www.photoradarspray.com/testimonials.htm 


You are using the moving gif of the yellow corvette which is owned by ON
TRACK & can be clearly viewed at: 
http://www.ontrackcorp.com/super_protector.htm 
The license plate on the the car clearly reads "ONTRACK". 


UNAUTHORIZED COPYRIGHT NUMBER FOUR 
ON TRACK Fraud Watch has detected unauthorized use of copyrighted ON TRACK
materials on your website at: 
http://www.photoradarspray.com/testimonials.htm 
You state: 
AS SEEN IN. 
OUR products have appeared in reputable media such as: 
TV advertising on major US networks like TNN, MTV, ESPN, ESP2, HDLN 
Heartland America (major National US catalog) 
The Edge (major National US catalog) 
Carol Wright Gifts (major National US catalog) 
Hundreds of automotive magazines around the world. 
  
You have directly copied this information from our website at: 
http://www.ontrackcorp.com/magazine_reviews.htm 
Some of the details in this information no longer appear on our website, but
do in our published literature. 


You are flagrantly using our images and information to sell a competitve
product. We consider this a very serious matter.  


Remove these images and offending text by 5:00 pm PST Thursday Jan. 12,
2006. 


Failure to do so will provide ON TRACK with the opportunity to launch legal
action against the web site owner and facilitating ISP without further
notice. ON TRACK normally seeks severe punitive and compensatory damages in
these matters. 


Further, we hereby request from Mr. George Poletes, Corporate Counsel,
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. to advise us how long the said
customer has been using your services (and presumably hosting ON TRACK
copyrighted material), so that we may form an opinion as to the potential
damages this has caused our company. 


Thank you. 


George Pasek, Director 
ON TRACK Manufacturing Corp. 
email: info@ontrackcorp.com 
web:  www.ontrackcorp.com 
Tel:   604-538-7362 
FAX: 604-538-7350 
Canada: Dept. 570, #800-15355-24th Avenue, Surrey, BC, V4A 2H9 
USA: P.O. Box 535, Blaine, WA, 98231-0535
